beans.description: Steps for syncPreprocessor - "serverPreprocessReader" - Returns the "next()" "namespace prefix -> url" Entry from the provided Namespaces Iterator - "serverPreprocessProcessor" - Effectively a Marshaller, converts a "namespace prefix -> url" Entry to Protobuf Message NamespaceEntry object - "serverPreprocessWriter" - Writes a "chunk" of Protobuf Message NamespaceEntries to the provided Output Stream
